name: FIVE: Champions of Canaan
description: In a region on the brink of endless war, tradition chose the weapon you wield. Your sworn allegiance compels you to fight. Honor your fatherâ€™s legacy. Become a true Champion of Canaan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I found the gameplay fun, clean, fast, and somewhat addictive. It could, however, use some tuning of progression speeds to make it get less repetitive (level up slower/not after almost every round, fewer rounds in arenas, a few more options for ability progression maybe). More tutorial elements and some slight UI updates would also be helpful. Overall I think the game has a lot of potential, and with a few tweaks all over it could be a really lasting and fun experience.
For $5, it is an insane bargain for hours of entertainment. I would sacrifice a can of beer for this game :)
